title: Analyzing Theoretical Debates to Explore the Role of Educational Technology

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational educational theory and understanding of elementary education settings, basic instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Course for pre-service and in-service teachers building theoretical foundations for educational technology utilization and analyzing real classroom application cases

learning_goals: Learners can critically analyze the impact of educational technology (media) on teaching-learning processes through theoretical debates.
Learners can identify changes in the role of learners in technology-based learning and propose effective instructional design strategies.
Learners can propose a balanced model between teacher-led and technology-dependent education tailored to the characteristics of social studies subjects.

resources: Social studies technology integration case videos
BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) utilization guide

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
